website_summaries.verdict: While not the sturdiest showerhead out there, this option still gets high marks for its attractiveness, even flow, and smooth adjustability.
pros: Provides a great, even water flow with no flow restrictor to deal with prior to installation
Modern look and very smooth adjustable movement
cons: Constructed of plastic, making it less rugged than other options
Lack of a flow restrictor means those living in water-restricted communities may have issues

customer_reviews.title: Let it rain
customer_reviews.text: 8" shower head does put out a realitively high pressure large coverage area of drenching flow. I really enjoy the size and even pattern it puts out. No high or low flow spots in water output. Head easily pivots and stays where you put it. I'm a wide shoulder guy, and this shower head keeps me covered. NO CONS AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: steve wheat

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great showerhead that provides good (not great) water pressure. It will drain your hot water tank, so just keep that In mind. I have a 40 gallon tank, and it will use most the hot water in 15 minutes. I just with there was a little more aeration for higher pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: What a delightful shower!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new shower head! My old shower head has been needing to be replaced for quite a long time. When I finally put this one up I have been asking myself what took me so long. This one is so very nice. It makes the showers feel so luxurious and so relaxing. The head is almost the size of a dinner plate. It allows so much water to spread around my body all at once. I get cleaner faster, and it keeps me warm throughout. The water pressure is very nice. It feels really incredible. Sometimes I find myself staying in the shower long after everything it is clean just because it feels so delicious.
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shower head, until last night after having it for a year it broke. My husband was taking a shower and heard an explosion sound. For a second he thought a pipe burst, but it was the shower head that broke and now the water just drops off the sides and nothing comes out the nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic drenching rain-like shower.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome shower head. I love it. It drenches you just like the rainfall-like shower heads I loved in Asia (Bankok Hilton!). Maybe a bit more powerful than those, but still a nice rain-like drenching. Don't expect a ton of power...but its and amazing feelling...you won't want to leave the shower. My only gripe is that its plastic...though a convincing imitation of stainless. I wish all these guys would simply make a full stainless version and charge more for it...I would have gladly paid for it. Nonetheless, its still awesome, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jetslacker

customer_reviews.title: This shower head is better than the average 4 star hotel shower head
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is better than the average 4 star hotel shower head, that's how good it is. Pro tip: pair with the delta extension/arm, and the head can be adjusted for a true rainfall, or slight angle rainfall experience. This definitely uses more water than a simple standard shower head, something to be aware of if you live in a city that has high cost/gallons of water used.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great
customer_reviews.text: Great size and pressure, for the price! I installed with a shower head extender so it would fit more in the middle of my stall shower and love the outcome. Overall it is a good shower head, keeping as much of my original pressure as possible and the diameter is perfect. Only downsides would be I think it drains my hot water much faster than before, making for a shorter shower and when you turn off the water it takes a few seconds for the water to full drain from the head. Other than these two things it is a great product for a modest price!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pressure!
customer_reviews.text: This shower is amazing for the price. I will be buying a couple more for the other bathrooms in my house. LIke showering under a personal waterfall. Very pleased! Only thing to pick on was the build quality. Picture makes it look like metal, but it is a plastic construction. Overall, doesn't effect performance, just thought I would put that out there.
customer_reviews.author: Erik A.

customer_reviews.title: The best shower head I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: 1st. I paid full price for this, no freebie or half price to write a review. WOW oh WOW, the best shower head that I have ever been under. Probably wastes too much water because it drowns you under buckets of hot water, feels like you are in a warm hard rain storm. Buying another for my 2nd bath.
customer_reviews.author: John and Dill Doe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower head
customer_reviews.text: Cheap way to upgrade the apartment shower. The pressure from this bad boy is heavenly and the wide surface area eliminates that "which section of my body will have to suffer in the cold?" dilemma that you have to put up with from tiny shower heads. Super happy with this purchase. Plus the plastic means minimal/no corrosion from hard water so I'd say this is a win win win.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No plumbers tape in box but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: The shower head was easy to install once I went out and got the plumbers tape that was supposed to come in the box but did not. Works well and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Commenter

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installing required no tools- I simply twisted off the old shower head and twisted this one on. At first I worried it wasn't going to be tight enough, but it is. There is no leakage at all. And great shower pressure!! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Greenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a great shower head without the 2gpm water restriction! All of the jets flow great, but there is not a lot of pressure behind it but the volume is there so I am good with it. When you buy this, I would recommend buying the extender arm
customer_reviews.author: Michael Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully as described
customer_reviews.text: The rainfall 8" shower head installed in minutes, two wraps of teflon tape on the pipe threads, a snug turn with a pipe wrench after hand tightening and VOILA!! I installed this on a Kohler K-76332-CP Wall-Mount Rainhead Arm with 3-Way Diverter. My wife and I both love the shower now, and wake up looking forward to our morning showers!
customer_reviews.author: 60+ married

customer_reviews.title: Uses a *lot* of water
customer_reviews.text: No flow restriction empties my 40 gallon hot water tank quickly. I'll try to add one, but suspect that doing so will also reduce the force of the spray considerably. At this point, I wish I'd bought a shower head of smaller diameter and lower flow (though this unit provides a nice shower (while it lasts)).
customer_reviews.author: Techno-Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Water flow
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have flow control hot and cold handles in shower i wouldn't recommend.The water flow was so fast it completely drained my hot water heater in less than 10 minutes.With a electric water heater this shower head would cost me a fortune to use.One shower and returned.The Kohler Forte 2.5 GPM was a much better option for a normal flow and nice looking shower head
customer_reviews.author: NBSB1967

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful shower head. The water flow is amazing. Probably gives the best shower I've ever had. Not sure how well it would work with low water pressure but at my house it's great. If it ever breaks, I'll buy a new one just like it but it appears to be well made. You cannot put a price tag on a good shower but at this price point it works better than shower heads I've purchased for over $100
customer_reviews.author: toby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower head, we bought 4
customer_reviews.text: We bought one shower head for our old house and loved it so much we bought another. We're on well water so we don't need low flow and love the waterfall. Then we moved and needed new shower heads so we bought two more.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Nice change from a traditional shower head.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Just screw it on. No tools needed. Provides full body water coverage which is nice. We installed it using existing short shower arm and it works perfect. Takes a few seconds for water pressure to cover full shower head, but it is GREAT. We love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Miley

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Whoa!! I’m not one to leave a review, but kind of felt compelled to do so here. I’m a 40 year old adult who treats my shower time like more of a burden...I’m in...I scrub and I’m out. More often than not my showers last 5min cuz I just am not one to stand in there wasting time away. Friends/colleagues/girlfriends/house guests that would waste time in the shower at 40 plus minutes a clip would befuddle me. Things changed for me today after installing this new shower head...I mean, it was life changing. I hopped out and bought a second one before I even had the chance to dry off :)
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: a great reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I'd expected, a great reliable product ! Now this is a great shower/rain head ! Amazing flow of water, beautifully made and I TRULY LIKE that you can tighten the top connector nozzle to main water pipe without any problems. It's securely nice and tight yes with a standard wrench ! Unlike some others that I bought and I wind up scratching them because I couldn't use a wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: So far this showerheas has been amazinggggg. You really do need plumber rape however. There is a very small leak from where you connect the showerheas but that may be because I didn't tighten it enough. But my showers have never been more relaxing. I get frequent headaches and this. I don't know what it is but I feel so nice having it rain on my head
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a new apartment and wanted to replace the shower head. Initially I purchased a Delta shower head and was extremely disappointed. I decided to try this one and I’m in love! The water pressure is great and this will likely result to much longer showers :)
customer_reviews.author: Hattie

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: This made a great replacement for the worn out shower head (6") on a Pulse shower system. Looks good and gives a nice rain shower.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh like a spa experience.
customer_reviews.text: Why have I waited so long to discover this! We changed out a smaller shower head for this one and it's like a day at a spa or a nice condo getaway (actually where I got this idea from to look for one) I'd install in all my bathrooms but the kids may never leave the shower...
customer_reviews.author: Alan F.

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head, great price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shower head after mistakenly installing an eco-friendly (and VERY pricey) Moen shower fixture set. The pressure and flow of that shower head was terrible. I was skeptical about a $25 shower head, but WOW, what a difference! We removed the small filter before installing (very easy to do with a pair of tweezers) and I can actually rinse shampoo out of my hair again. Super pleased with this purchase, and for such an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Soft, big water drops over a big surface
customer_reviews.text: What more can you ask for? My previous one was 2.25in and water was uneven and sharp. This nozzle makes the water soft. When it comes over you it feels like a heavy blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Braedon

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: The RAIN effect of this shower head is so soothing and comforting makes you want to take a shower several times a day!
customer_reviews.author: science

customer_reviews.title: Nice but get the extension arm
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my parents. They didn't like the idea, but now they LOVE this shower head. Very nice feeling of having so many jets. The pressure is lower due to many jets, so don't expect this thing to shoot straight down and out at a 45 degree angle from the wall like your old school shower head. Because of this, I high my recommend an extension arm. We don't have any water pressure issues in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is really great! It has its own ball hinge built into it, and it moves very smoothly. The water pressure is not too high, and not too low, it's really just prefect. It's also huge! It's so much bigger than our stupid apartment shower head! It feels like you're in a heavy rain, and I love that.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Came pre used
customer_reviews.text: Just received the shower head it has water spots all over it. So it obviously isn’t new. I’m disappointed especially seeing its an almost $30.00 shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty84

customer_reviews.title: The GREATEST!!
customer_reviews.text: The GREATEST!!! Had a bathroom renovation done and was totally displeased with the showerhead the contractor put into the shower....Checked out AMAZON and found this.....UNBELIEVABLE!! Showers are a part of my existence and this shower head has gotten me to sing in the shower again....I read the reviews before purchasing but thought they were exaggerations....they were not!! Bless you....I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: shela silverman

customer_reviews.title: ... it a couple times so far but it's been great! very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a couple times so far but it's been great! very easy to install, I love that it was self sealing! no water pressure problems at all. UPDATE__ -This shower head is awesome!! have been using it for a while now and have absolutely loved it! Stop your search and buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shower head!!! You would think you are in a rain storm. It is indeed a high volume unit. Normally after my wife and I take our shower we have plenty of hot water. Now we tend to drain the 30 gal water heater because of the high volume of water and we tend to stay longer in the shower. It feels great!!!
customer_reviews.author: kiwi

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this shower head with no alteration to its output flow and installation was simple & easy. We've been using it for about a week and it works great; the large area 'drenching' spray feels wonderful. The only odd thing is that when the water is turned off it takes about a minute for the shower head to stop spraying. For us this is a good thing as it encourages tighter turn-off of our old faucets which prevents dripping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get It !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For $27.00, this showerhead is fantastic. Took me longer to Take my clothes off and hop in the shower than it did for me to replace my old shower head with this one. My Friends came to town the same week I installed it, and I let them use my bathroom. They couldnt get their young sons out of the shower once they got in. The Mom actually had to put a timer on them :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upped my shower game
customer_reviews.text: Life changing on your shower game. I read a bunch of reviews on rainfall shower heads and decided on this one - did not disappoint! I installed it myself without any issues in ~2 minutes. It's been working great and feels so good! Definitely worth the upgrade for such an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: einstein1990

customer_reviews.title: It's raining in my shower
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, and screws right on without pipe tape ( I hate pipe tape. I always wrap it in the wrong direction! What, only me?!?) It doesn't have a #$%& flow restrictor to rip out before you can use it, so It has a pleasant flow. Mine points straight down , so I get the real Rainfall effect
customer_reviews.author: Gerry K

customer_reviews.title: 10 seconds to luxury!
customer_reviews.text: It took me less than 10 seconds to install.. Now I'm literally bathing under a waterfall!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower head!
customer_reviews.text: The water pressure for me is great, and even though it's at an angle (we just have the standard apartment set up) it has great coverage! If I had two showers, I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: The way a shower should feel
customer_reviews.text: The BEST shower head ever! Even better than at luxury resorts. If you like a good strong and full shower, then I can't recommend this enough. Inexpensive, attractive, and super-easy to install. So glad I stumbled upon this. The pressure is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Codianne Fowler

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: Best rain shower head on market. Absolutely wonderful flow rate and soothing coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mazziotti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is perfect in every way. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: P. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Love this Showerhead. Easy to install (I also purchased the Delta Faucet UA902-PK Universal Components Showering Arm, 10"). Performs as adverstised. Unit is designed with durable materials which are easy to clean/maintain.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Head!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head!!!! I think it is my most favorite ever. The pressure is perfect and the water flow is fabulous!!!! Thanks so very much. I just ordered another for my other shower!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Great showerhead
customer_reviews.text: This shower head was easy to install and provides really nice water coverage. Because it connects directly to the pipe without the additional complex movable arm assemblies that some use, there are no pieces which will fall apart later. While this makes the spray coverage limited by where your pipe is located, perhaps an issue for taller people, it worked perfectly for me, and it also has a ball joint for positioning within that range. Great showerhead.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES M. JAMESON

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower head with good water pressure. I got one last year and another one for a second bathroom this year.
customer_reviews.author: Roja N.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the shower more
customer_reviews.text: This really uses more water than my other shower head, it feels nice and the fit was good. just be aware of the increased water flow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower head I’ve ever had! I’ve never had the “rain “ type; it is a totally different showering experience. It probably uses a lot of water, but you can rinse a lot quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easily fixed by an in line flow control valve (very ...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what wanted in a shower head. Soft rain. Why 4 stars? With my water pressure, it uses a lot of water. Easily fixed by an in line flow control valve (very inexpensive--see Amazon). Good product, good value.
customer_reviews.author: NW Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this has made!! I can now easily rinse out all the shampoo and conditioner from my long thick hair quickly and easily. Feels wonderful on the skin as well. I just wish I had replaced my old Moen shower head sooner!
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick to install. Makes my old shower feel like new!
customer_reviews.author: T lady 850

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower head
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head. The water doesn't come out hard but it's a lot of water at once and it feels good. I have not noticed any changes with my water bill. I recommend this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Lakelia

customer_reviews.title: It feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought another, and when I return to Florida I’ll buy two more
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey D. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and functional....great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Replaced rain shower head in our rental house, didn't want to spend too much and was surprised by the quality and the look of this. Delivery was followed up with an email from the company expressing their gratitude. It was silly and fun, love this company
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Luxury
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. Great shower experience. Like a high-end hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyne

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Described!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is outstanding. Even without removing the flow regulator, there's a full stream of "rain" water. It took 30 seconds to install. Great when a product actually exceeds the promise in its description. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael - Desert-Rat

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this shower head! My biggest problem with shower heads has always been the gap in the middle so it makes rinsing my hair take forever. This shower head has fixed that problem and I can quickly rinse my hair!! I love it! Great rainfall shower head for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Easy and nice
customer_reviews.text: I put this shower head in my rental and it was SUPER EASY. I did it in 5 minutes and was so proud of myself. Its very nice and has some swivel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shower head
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower head! I wouldn’t consider it high pressure but still love it. I like the size of it and how the water covers almost your entire body. It was also easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: SReagan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really like this high flow shower head. Feels great, flow is evenly distributed and full. The head pivots smooth and targets well (even with a standard short feed pipe. As good or better than the over priced commercial names. Best value.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. S

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these ever since I came back from having one for a week at the resort from my honeymoon. Wasn't sure how this would work in bathroom but decided to give it a shot. Wow! Best (home) shower ever! I just got it so I can't say how durable this will be, but showers are soooo nice now. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Its a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Its like having a blanket of water cover you in the shower. If I could give 10 stars this bad boy would have it. Water pressure really good, Head rotates perfectly. Attaches right to the pipe that comes out of the wall, no need for extension bar.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing waterfall showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Wonderful coverage and nice fat streams of water... just what I was hoping for - true waterfall experience.
customer_reviews.author: On the move

customer_reviews.title: So Good
customer_reviews.text: Even with semi poor water pressure this was a game changer for our cabin. Hopefully it hold up to hard water well. Works perfectly so far and everyone is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado246

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: This shower head does exactly what it is supposed to do. It screws onto the delivery pipe and self-seals in a matter of seconds, no need for plumber's tape. Get in the shower and turn it on and this thing will drench you.
customer_reviews.author: Olddude

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Best shower head we've had. Nice flow of water and classy look in
customer_reviews.author: GHalt727

customer_reviews.title: This one works great. I will order another for my guest
customer_reviews.text: My 88 year old mother just loves it. I was concerned because we've tried so many other types of shower heads and none worked because of the low water pressure in her house. This one works great. I will order another for my guest bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower head
customer_reviews.text: I love it I stay in the shower longer and it's more enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: TINIKA

customer_reviews.title: Best shower head ever!
customer_reviews.text: OMG the best shower ever! I thought we had really bad water pressure but it was the horrible shower head. This one makes you want to stay in the shower all day. Feels so good!
customer_reviews.author: Duchess of Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, however...
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head, however I wish it came with a flow restrictor. After one 10 minute shower I'm out of hot water. Where as I never had that problem with my old shower head that had a built in flow restrictor
customer_reviews.author: Customer #1

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower head
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head! It took the handyman about 5 minutes to install and it's like having the best, spa shower imaginable. This was just going to be a temporary fix for a short-term apartment rental but I plan to pay to have it uninstalled when I move and take it with me. It's that good. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: sammydamm

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise!
customer_reviews.text: What I was worried about was that the larger sprinkler head would come at the cost of less water pressure. Basic fluid dynamics. However, after trying the shower head this morning for the first time it seems like I'm getting the wider spray area without any noticeable reduction of water pressure. Nice surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Kammerer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say - it’s just awesome. Total rainfall concept. Powerful and just lovely.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage and pressure
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The pressure is great, and it has a high volume so it's not harsh but provides plenty of water. Very easy to install with an extender attachment.
customer_reviews.author: nasir malik

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have read the description closer, but I wasn't expecting plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: best shower head I have yet used
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head, great pressure and volume. will be buying a second one for my main bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: NCreloader

customer_reviews.title: I look forward to a shower!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head! It was so Inexpensive that I wasn't sure if it was going to be ok, but believe me, it's great. My sister in law bought one first on Amazon & told me about it so I bought one & love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great strong shower, nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I hoped for. Provides a strong rain shower, not a wimpy drizzle or stinging blast. Installed easily in just minutes. Best shower I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: John M Witherell

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Nice,BIG showerhead,almost the size of a volleyball,but works great,good purchase
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Best shower head ever!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is freaking amazing! It was blow the dirt off of you with the water pressure! Everyone should own this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy and Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A perfect shower
customer_reviews.text: One of the best shower heads I have ever used. This thing is like standing out in the pouring down rain and I really love it. Replaced all of the heads in my home with this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: B Jones

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice heavy rainfall effect without pounding or blasting you when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the shower head I have been searching for for 20 years. It has a nice heavy rainfall effect without pounding or blasting you when wide open and works well with tap partially open. It drenches your entire body.
customer_reviews.author: IMRU2

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This shower head took taking a shower to a whole new level. Taking a shower now is what I look forward too in the morning. The water for some reason is now even hotter than before. This is definitely worth buying since it doesn't hit you in the pockets for the price sold for.
customer_reviews.author: tamara

customer_reviews.title: Omg! I just had the best shower in my life!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is fantastic. I installed it in less than 3 minutes. It is well worth it. Usually, I am in and out of the shower in 6 minutes maximum. Well, since I got this shower head, I have been showering longer...enjoying the rainfall sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Big
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Big, full, soft downpour of water. I researched for a few days before buying this one and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: an.honest.review

customer_reviews.title: So much water!
customer_reviews.text: This guy is the best! I swear you could drown yourself it puts out so much water. That being said, it does put out a lot of water. Not at all energy efficient in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: This was fantastic! Turned my shower instantly into a spa
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic! Turned my shower instantly into a spa. I just wish that my water pressure is a bit higher so the water runs better.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Seemed a little better without the aerator so have leaved it out
customer_reviews.text: Actually has high pressure! Seemed a little better without the aerator so have leaved it out. Really surprised since most rain showers have terrible pressure. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: T. Baqar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS SHOWERHEAD!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to just get by until I could go replace the exact (way more expensive) one I had had previously in my shower. Wow!!! What a shower head, and what a price! After the first time I used it I ordered another one for another bathroom in our house and I'm about to get one more for the last bathroom! It's a hit! The whole family wants one now! And it's easy to install. I didn't even need plumber's tape.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, But Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cute design and cheap, but mine leaks, leaks, leaks. Water doesn’t come out of all of the holes either.
customer_reviews.author: luvmy2lilgirls

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Great shower head. It feels great and is well made. Easy to install, and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MrRazorsReviews

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the bigger shower head
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the bigger shower head, than what we had before. I did have to drill out the plastic piece inside so that the water pressure would increase. Otherwise it would have been low pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Travis R.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: uses way too much water, and not much of an improvement over what I already had
customer_reviews.author: swampthing07070

customer_reviews.title: Great showered
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and provides so much water for a great shower.
customer_reviews.author: h

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shower head, not a lot of water pressure, do not think these are made for that.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Silva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. So much water comes out. Best $17 I’ve spent!!
customer_reviews.author: JWRN

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head!
customer_reviews.text: This shower head delivers as advertised! Very good buy for the money too. My only concern was that due to it not having a flow restrictor, our hot water runs out after a little over 5 minutes! But what a great 5 minute shower!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is just as advertised. Easy to install and a wonderful flow. Really couldn't expect more from the price.
customer_reviews.author: imgapr

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great shower head for the money! I've had it for a month and it's large size works well in a large shower.
customer_reviews.author: MetalFan

product_meta.title: Luxe RainLuxe Shower Head Round High Pressure High Flow Showerhead Chrome Finish Universal Replacement For Bathroom Shower Heads
feature_bullets: 💦 INSTALLS IN MINUTES – Designed to eliminate weak water flow and coverage of standard showerheads, the RainLuxe Rainfall Shower Head is the ideal shower head replacement. It installs in minutes without any special plumbing tools. It connects to any standard shower arm or overhead fixture for a ceiling installation. Try it as your outdoor shower head. No tools required. Includes rubber gasket w filter screen. Everything you need is in the package

💦 EASY TO MAINTAIN AND CLEAN – Top rated, easy to maintain, over 100 anti-clogging nozzles drench you in the most luxurious, highest flow your water pressure will allow. Many buyers say this is the best shower head. There is no flow restrictor, no water restriction. All you get is a high flow of a waterfall.

💦 YOUR SHOWER IS A SPA EXPERIENCE – Shower with a Waterfall / Rainfall Feeling. Get away, every day. Just like a 5-star hotel or spa, the RainLuxe rainfall showerhead turns your bathroom into the best spa experience! Durably built, better than any hotel shower head for high volume and long lasting, yet at a fraction of the cost of a shower panel or other rain shower heads.

💦 MATCHES YOUR SHOWER FIXTURES – The Rainluxe chrome shower head finish matches your other bathroom shower fixtures and has a swivel joint to aim the head to where you need it most. Made of rust free materials, your shower head will look good for years to come.

💦 UPGRADE YOUR SHOWER – This will be your last shower upgrade with the ultimate waterfall shower head. It has excellent performance at high or low water pressure. After showering with the RainLuxe shower head, you’ll never go back. No need to disassemble to remove scale from the nozzles, simply wipe off the face of your rainfall showerhead.
